item.title: Navigating your Rails project codebase with vim
item.author: itkalin@gmail.com (Ivan Tkalin)
item.description: When you work with source code, it is always nice to have the abilty to quickly jump to class/method definitions for either your own code or code from one of your ruby gems. This articles describes how to do this in vim with exuberant ctags, guard, and guard-ctags-bundler. Tags A tag is an identifier that appears in a “tags” file. It is a sort of label that can be jumped to.
